bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Pathological Condition identical with tou feng 頭風 , head wind. Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 Substance Entry mi feng 蜜蜂 quoting Shen nong ben cao jing 神農本草經 : 主風頭，除蠱毒，補虛羸傷中。久服令人光澤好顏色，不老 , “It controls wind-head, eliminates gu poison, supplements depletion with emaciation with harm to the center. Ingested over a long time it provides luster and a good complexion”, writes: 頭瘋 , 除蠱毒 , 補虛羸傷中。久服令人光澤 , 好顏色 , 不 老 , “[It cures] head wind - illness , eliminates gu poison, supplements depletion with emaciation, and [cures] harm to one’s center. Ingested over a long time it provides luster and a good complexion”.
